title: RENO Virtual Assistant
caption: Virtual assistant built with Python. Utilizes Python modules to recognize speech and complete tasks.

title: Euchre
caption: Euchre virtual card game simulator built with C++ for single and multiplayer play on the terminal.

title: ML Classifier
caption: Built a Machine Learning Classifier using a simplified version of a "Multi-Variate Bernoulli Naive Bayes Classifier".

title: Vidly
caption: Built movie management service based on the CodeWithMosh ReactJS course ("Mastering React").

title: COVID-19 Tracker
caption: COVID-19 infected, recovered, and deaths live tracker built using ReactJS. Includes visualizations. Information fetched from an API.

title: Portfolio ReactJS Website
caption: Built a portfolio website with ReactJS and Bootstrap. Developed contact form, styling, routing, etc.
